import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Project extends Component { state = {}; render() { let sectionClassname; let h2className; if ((this.props.nrOfProjects - this.props.projectNr) % 2 !== 0) { sectionClassname = 'page-section portfolio'; h2className = 'page-section-heading text-center text-uppercase text-secondary mb-0'; } else { sectionClassname = 'page-section bg-primary text-white mb-0'; h2className = 'page-section-heading text-center text-uppercase text-white'; } return (

#{this.props.projectNr}: {this.props.project.tittle}

{this.props.project.postBody}

Free Download!

Log Cabin

); } } export default Project;
